about_the_game:
Master an adaptive combat system that evolves with you. Experiment, customize, and unleash spectacular mecha battles that feel like a scene straight out of your favorite anime.

2D SPECTACLE ACTION

Ironweld’s combat system goes beyond simple stat upgrades:

  • Transform your attacks with new animations, effects, and sounds as you grow stronger.

  • Chain combos seamlessly, taking the fight to the air and delivering devastating finishers.

  • Enjoy combat that rewards skill, experimentation, and creativity over memorizing rigid inputs.

Every battle is your stage—direct your own mecha showdown.

BUILD YOUR ULTIMATE MECH

Ironweld offers endless customization:

  • Interchangeable Parts & Moves: Swap in new abilities and animations to match your playstyle. Don’t want a launcher? Replace it. Want a high-risk counter? Equip it.

  • No Random Loot: Experiment with builds that work for you. Whether you focus on raw power, crowd control, or infinite combos, every choice matters.

  • Enhanced Visuals: Upgrade your mech to unlock more dramatic effects—from explosive visuals to satisfying sound cues, every upgrade feels earned.

EXPLORE A WORLD IN RUIN

Outside combat, traverse stages filled with hazards, resources, and of course mechs:

  • Mine valuable ores to purchase new parts and abilities.

  • Face challenging foes—mechs like you, but with unexpected twists.

  • Find friendly mechs to join you in fulfilling your mission.

  • Immerse yourself in a linear, platforming-lite experience designed to break up the pace of combat without overwhelming you.

No tedious backtracking. No filler. Just focused exploration with purpose.

A STORY FORGED IN IRON

In a world on the brink of collapse, iron and oil are as essential as food and water. You are a self-aware mech tasked with uniting others to survive. What does it mean to create a future when your very existence depends on dwindling resources?

Discover the secrets of Ironweld and decide what kind of legacy you’ll leave behind.

WHY IRONWELD?

Ironweld isn’t just about the numbers—it’s about evolving every aspect of your gameplay. From how you fight to how you feel during combat, every upgrade is a transformation.

This isn’t a loot grind. This is a self expression.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU @ 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU with OpenGL ES 3.0 support and 2 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Quad-core CPU @ 2.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU with OpenGL ES 3.0 support and 4 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Sound Card

short_description: Ironweld is a 2D action game combining fighting-game combat with RPG customization. Build your mech, master creative combos, and evolve your playstyle in this fast-paced single-player experience.
